channel.title: CVE Feed for Rexroth -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rexroth -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-23857|2024-08-03T19:14:09.701Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20l25%2C%20l45%2C%20l65%2C%20l75%2C%20l85%2C%20xm21%2C%20xm22%2C%20xm41%20and%20xm42%20indramotion%20xlc
item.description: Login with hash: The login routine allows the client to log in to the system not by using the password, but by using the hash of the password. Combined with CVE-2021-23858, this allows an attacker to subsequently login to the system.

item.title: CVE-2021-23855|2024-08-03T19:14:09.329Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20indramotion%20xlc
item.description: The user and password data base is exposed by an unprotected web server resource. Passwords are hashed with a weak hashing algorithm and therefore allow an attacker to determine the password by using rainbow tables.

item.title: CVE-2021-23856|2024-08-03T19:14:09.247Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20l20%2C%20l40
item.description: The web server is vulnerable to reflected XSS and therefore an attacker might be able to execute scripts on a clientâ€™s computer by sending the client a manipulated URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-23858|2024-08-03T19:14:09.398Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20l25%2C%20l45%2C%20l65%2C%20l75%2C%20l85%2C%20xm21%2C%20xm22%2C%20xm41%20and%20xm42%20indracontrol%20xlc
item.description: Information disclosure: The main configuration, including users and their hashed passwords, is exposed by an unprotected web server resource and can be accessed without authentication. Additionally, device details are exposed which include the serial number and the firmware version by another unprotected web server resource.
